content: Yeah, I played Carcassonne with my dad last Sunday, and we both enjoyed it a lot. It was easy to learn, and the gameplay flowed pretty smoothly. I liked how it's a pretty chill game, not too competitive or complex. We played two games back-to-back, and I won both times, but it was still fun. I think what I liked most about it was how easy it was to learn, but how challenging it was to win. Do you have any recommendations for other games that are similar to Carcassonne or Ticket to Ride?
